member.name: T:SonderSollutionsXM.ListPushing.ExList
member.summary: This Static Class Allows The Use Of 'Pushing' For Typeof List of Any type and kind. Pushing -- Moving All Values inside of list from bottom (end) to top (beginning index 0) then overwriting last index position with the desired item.

member.name: M:SonderSollutionsXM.ListPushing.ExList.PushFromEnd``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},``0)
member.summary: (List Must Have At-lease 2 items) Will Overwrite Desired Item at the End Of List. After moving all current values in list from the bottom (end index) to the top (beginning index 0). Example (list of 4 indexes), 0 = 1, 1 = 2, 2 = 3, 3 = desired Item Wanting To Add into the list
member.param: The Item That Will Be Pushed Into The List Provided

member.name: M:SonderSollutionsXM.ListPushing.ExList.PushAtIndex``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},``0,System.Int32)
member.summary: (List Must Have At-lease 2 items) Will over Item at desired index position. After moving all current values in list from desired index provided (PushAtIndex) to the top (beginning index 0).
member.param: The Item That Will Be Pushed Into The List Provided
The index to begin the pushing process
